reviews.text: Day 2 of the challenge and I have learned so much by doing the homework and listening to the speakers. Each day the team puts another puzzle piece into perspective. The information is given at a pace that allows me to absorb it with the homework assignment.  It will take time but I believe the process is clearer than ever before. I'm thankful for all the information.

reply.message:
Thank you for sharing your experience with us Erica! We're thrilled to hear that you're finding value in the challenge and that you're learning a lot from the homework and speakers.

Our team works hard to provide information in a way that's easy to understand and absorb, and we're glad to hear that it's helping you gain clarity.

Keep up the great work, and if you ever need further assistance, feel free to reach out to us.

reviews.text: Amazing tool, opportunity, and training. Coach Kris and Coach Dante are ROCKSTARS!!! THE best!
reviews.title: Amazing!

reply.message: Thank you so much for your amazing review Kris! We're thrilled to hear that you're enjoying ClickFunnels and finding value in the training provided by Coach Kris and Coach Dante. They truly are rockstars!

reviews.text:
Tried Clickfunnels 2.0 for my business and although it looks promising it just has too many flaws for businesses to take it seriously.

1) Faulty Facebook tracking - this is probably the biggest one. Instead of tracking successful purchases like every other platform, it tracks all purchases (even unsuccessful attempts like declined transactions, failed CVV etc).  This means you cannot use Facebook ads as you cannot track your purchases correctly.

2) No Apple Pay. We've used Apple Pay in the past and it has increased our conversions by over 50%. Clickfunnels does not have the option for Apple Pay, Google Pay, Klarna etc. 
It is 2024, this is absolutely unacceptable.

3) Glitchy Platform. Every once in a while the platform freezes for no reason and you have to refresh the page losing your work.  

In conclusion, while clickfunnels looked promising at the start, it is lacking in so many major ways that the clickfunnels 2.0 feels like a downgrade in so many ways. 

There are just so many better platforms out there that I would not recommend clickfunnels to anyone looking for funnel/website builder for their business.
reviews.title: Not worth the subscription price

reviews.text:
A great support Community, i have been struggling to make a funnel both in English and italiano. Dante Torelli helped me to explained to me how to create it and it was not diffcult as i thought.
Grazie

We're thrilled to hear that you found our support community helpful, and we're especially glad that Dante Torelli was able to assist you in creating your funnel. We're here to make your experience as smooth as possible! Grazie for being part of our community, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need further assistance.

From insightful strategies to actionable tips, Dante's guidance propelled us forward with confidence and clarity. We are grateful for the invaluable lessons learned and excited for what's to come!

reviews.text: Coach Kris was brilliant and had a great energy (especially loved the quote he shared at the end and the fun Top Gun references throughout, made it engaging!). He shared informative and useful skills on the Group Q&A which have helped me feel more confident in building my Lead Funnel. Feels less like Mount Everest now and more like a small hill to overcome - thank you!

reply.message:
Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed Coach Kris's session and found it both engaging and informative.

It's fantastic to know that the skills shared during the Group Q&A have boosted your confidence in building your Lead Funnel. We're here to support you every step of the way, turning what might have felt like Mount Everest into a more manageable hill :) 

Cheers to your success!

reviews.text: Man (and all of you woMen out there), Dante Torelli is FIRE! his eloquence, breadth of knowledge, the way he substantiates his responses with examples, is absolutely great. And somehow his style draws out great questions! I'm learning a lot and very grateful.
reviews.title: Clickfunnels - so useful!

reply.message: We're glad you're finding value and learning a lot from Dante's sessions—your gratitude is much appreciated!

reviews.text: Dante was very informative and helpful.
reviews.title: Dante was awesome

reviews.text: Amazing experience. I even enjoyed the irresistible offer they made on day 4. There's so much knowledge here. I love it. I live Dante's energy in the implementation calls too. So awesome!
reviews.title: Amazing experience

reviews.text: I am in the 5 Day Challenge for learning how to use funnels. I really loved the Dante’s VIP session on day 2. I learned so much. He is such a great teacher! Thank you Dante!!!

We'll be sure to pass along your appreciation to Dante. If you have any further questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out.

reviews.text:
I recently started the 'Build Your First Funnel' challenge for free, and wow, it's been a game-changer! The course itself is packed with useful info, but what really stands out is the incredible support from the coaches. Kris has been a lifesaver, making personalized videos to help me through tough spots. And the VIP coaching sessions with Aldo and Eli? Absolute gold - I've learned so much from them. If I could, I'd give this course way more than 5 stars!

As for the Clickfunnels software, there was a bit of a learning curve, but it's been so worth it. My sales funnels and website have gone from 'meh' to 'wow'! They look super professional now, way clearer, and the layout is just so much cleaner. It's like giving your online presence a total makeover, and I'm loving the new look!
reviews.title: I recently started the 'Build Your…

reply.message: We're thrilled to hear the 'Build Your First Funnel' challenge has been a game-changer for you! It's wonderful that our coaches have made such a positive impact! Your success and satisfaction with our software transforming your sales funnels and website are exactly what we strive for. Thank you for sharing your experience; we look forward to continuing to support your growth!

reviews.text:
At first clickfunnels looks promising. Easy to use interface and great way of building funnels. The issue is if you are not actively utilizing the software then the cost outweighs the benefit.

I give this company 1 star because if you decide to end your membership they "delete all your work permanently" without any way of backing it up. That to me was a waste of over $1750 in freelancer work plus 3 months of paying upwards of $199 for a funnel I did not get to utilize. I think the money-grab tactic of this company is far too painful and they need to bring back a way to go inactive either for free or a small $10 monthly fee like they used to have.
reviews.title: Forced to delete all my hard work

reply.message:
Hey Nicholas, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We genuinely appreciate your insights and want to assure you that your experience is important to us.

We understand your frustration and regret any inconvenience you may have faced regarding the deletion of your work upon ending your membership. We are continually working to enhance our platform, and your feedback serves as a valuable source of information for us.

We are actively exploring options to provide users with a more flexible solution when it comes to ending their memberships without losing their hard work, including a pause option for 2.0. While we can't undo what has happened in your case, we are committed to learning from it and making improvements.

Please know that your concerns have been escalated to our development and customer support teams. We take this opportunity to thank you for being a part of the ClickFunnels community, and we hope to have the chance to address your concerns and provide a better experience in the future.

All the best, 

ClickFunnels Team

reviews.text:
Just finished a ticket with customer services updating my card details
Francesca Bianchi you are a super star, unfortunately I cannot give a 10 out of 5 here :-)))
Swift, professional, accurate and above all friendly.
Keep up the outstanding work, you are indeed a truly valuable asset to ClickFunnels
I could not leave an internal review since the ticket was already closed, I do hope this message gets through to the people who need to know it in ClickFunnels.
reviews.title: Customer services

Hey Tony, Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience with our customer service, especially with Francesca Bianchi. We're thrilled to hear that she provided you with swift, professional, and friendly assistance.

We'll make sure to pass along your appreciation to Francesca and the team. It's fantastic to know that our team members are making a positive impact.

If you ever have more feedback or need assistance in the future, feel free to reach out. We're here to help!

reviews.text:
At this moment I am doing the your first funnel challenge and upgraded to vip for free. With the free upgrade also come two daily live coaching sessions. 
I loved Coach Kris/Maverick. He was very clear with explaining things and walking us through the homework assignments for day 1. 
I also learned there are a ton of free ways to learn the skills you need to succeed at clickfunnels. Looking forward to learning more and working with clickfunnels 2.0

Thank you Lisa for taking the time to share your experience with the Your First Funnel Challenge and the VIP upgrade. We're delighted to hear that you found value in the coaching sessions with Coach Kris/Maverick. We're committed to providing clear and helpful guidance to our users.

We're here to support your learning journey and are excited to have you on board with ClickFunnels 2.0.

If you ever have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. We're here to help you succeed!

ClickFunnels Team

reviews.text: Great implimentation call with Mavrick.  Tons of great info but he goes WAY too fast to absorb it so everyone (if that have time) has to watch the replay.  We actuallhy hosted a separate VIP Zoom after the 4 day of the Challende and some of the folks on that call, who attended the previous sessions, Didn't even know how to start a funnel.  Just saying...  Lots of good stuff.  Could be better delivered.
reviews.title: Drinking from a fire hose...

reply.message:
Hi Stephen

We appreciate your feedback on the implementation call with Maverick. While it provided valuable information, the fast pace made it challenging to absorb everything, leading many participants to watch the replay. We take your input on delivery into consideration for future improvements

reviews.text:
I am currently doing the free build your first funnel challenge and the course content is outstanding but what stands out the most is the truley amazing support from the coaches!  Kris has recorded videos to show me step by step how to do things I've been stuck on, Aldo and Eli have been running the VIP coaching sessions after the main training and I have learned SO much!  If I could give this training 10 stars I would. 

The Clickfunnels software takes some getting used to but the layout and look of my sales funnels and website now is worlds away from what it was!  They look more professional, clearer to read and the whole layout looks so much cleaner

reviews.text: Wanted to buy CF 5 years ago, then years ago, but unfortunately I didnt. Finnaly bought them this  year and really picked it up last few weeks with making my weblage, workflows and now funnels to launch my business. Especially helpful are Coach-a-thons from Dante Torelly who like Russel himself is 100% devoted to serving people. Dantes input really gave me a boost on my journey last few weeks. Ty

reviews.text: Completed my first funnel challenge. The experience was amazing. There are no words to the depth of Russell Brunson's compassion and his give-a-ways. It made it possible for me to continue, so I can master the skill of funnel building. The daily coaches were great. Dante stood out shoulders above the rest because he was knowledgeable, organized, efficient, personable. He stayed aware of the time and made sure he answered everyone's questions.
reviews.title: Completed my first funnel challenge

reply.message: Thank you for sharing your experience Deborah!

reviews.text:
Run the other way. When I first created my site on Clickfunnels, I was blown away with the interface, it all seemed so user-friendly and looked so professional. 

However, that clearly comes at a cost, because NOTHING worked!! 

Honestly, I think clickfunnels has been released before being ab
reviews.title: Run the other way

reply.message:
I'm really sorry to hear about your frustrating experience with ClickFunnels. We deeply value your feedback, as it helps us improve our platform and provide a better user experience for all our customers. We understand the importance of having a reliable and functional tool to create successful funnels and websites.

Our team is continuously working to enhance ClickFunnels, addressing any issues and bugs that users encounter. We take your concerns seriously, and we are committed to ensuring that ClickFunnels lives up to its promise of being a user-friendly and professional platform.

If you have specific concerns or issues you'd like us to address, please feel free to share them with us at support@clickfunnels.com. We're here to assist you and make your ClickFunnels experience as smooth and effective as possible. Thank you for your patience and for choosing ClickFunnels.
